user_query: I'm a teacher planning an educational field trip for my students and want to create an interactive app to enhance their learning experience. Help me find a talented developer with a gender-neutral name who specializes in educational app development. Additionally, suggest some popular apps by the same developer for me to review and gather ideas.

TaskList.description: Search for developers who specialize in educational app development and filter results to include only those with gender-neutral names.
Gather detailed profiles of found developers, including their portfolio and previous projects.
Select a few popular apps developed by the identified developer.
Compile a list of suggested apps along with their features to facilitate idea generation for the new educational app.
